!Warehouse Keeper Valkon: Only fools and donkeys carry unnecessarily heavy loads. Now, why don't you entrust your items to our safe and inexpensive Iron Gate. I, Valkon, swear in the name of the Iron Gate to guard your property with my life, so go ahead and give it to me.
